Header: Fresh rainfall brings relief to people in Indian Kashmir
Content: Rains brought down temperatures in Indian Kashmir after days of sweltering heat. Residents in summer capital Srinagar witnessed light rains with overcast skies in the evening that brought relief from the sultry temperature. Meanwhile, tourists taking a boat ride at the iconic Dal Lake were quickly taken back to their hotels as the waves grew stronger.
